actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The orc warlord makes two Longsword attacks and one Skull Club attack, or it makes three Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Skull Club
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (2d4+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d8+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Martial Adept
special_abilities.desc: A melee or ranged weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the orc warlord hits with it (included in the attack).
